mapper.insert: insert into storeodr( uid, gid, mode, acl, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", t0, t1, "year", subject, op, text, form, formargs, cat, phase, prev, plan, org, ou, person, "length", sum_qty, sum_amount ) values( #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModified}, #{version}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{year}, #{subject}, #{opId}, #{rawText}, #{formId}, #{formArguments}, #{categoryId}, #{phaseId}, #{prevId}, #{planId}, #{orgId}, #{orgUnitId}, #{personId}, #{length}, #{totalQuantity}, #{totalAmount} );
